liukuri.title: About This Application
liukuri.descriptionHTML: This is a web app visualizing the current electricity prices and sources, inspired by exceptionally high electricity prices in 2022. In addition it also features an electricity cost calculator with which you can determine how much your electricity consumption in Finland has cost based on real Fingrid datahub exported data. Built using Vaadin.

logo.title: About the Logo
logo.descriptionHTML: The logo has been created by graphical designer Topi Saavalainen.
